DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine safety , tolerability , efficacy pembrolizumab ( MK-3475 ) combination chemotherapy immunotherapy participant unresectable metastatic non-small cell lung cancer ( NSCLC
DOC.brief_title: A Study Pembrolizumab ( MK-3475 ) Combination With Chemotherapy Immunotherapy Participants With Lung Cancer ( MK-3475-021/KEYNOTE-021 )
